# Frost (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
Upon command, a *frost* weapon is sheathed in icy cold that deals an extra 1d6 points of cold damage on a successful hit. The cold does not harm the wielder. The effect remains until another command is given.

Moderate evocation; CL 8th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Chill Metal (Spell)|chill metal]]* or *[[Ice Storm (Spell)|ice storm]]*; Price +1 bonus.

Source: PF Core Rulebook, pg. 470
